attributes.action: stop migrants coming into the country unless they can support them selves for 2 years with no help from our state
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there is an estimated 35 million pound being taken from our country and sent to poland by migrant workers each month and that doesnt include all the other ethnic people working in our country we should stop migrants coming into this country unless they can support them selves for a minimum of 2 years.that means no medical care unless they can afford it .no housing .no benifits. no free schooling etc ,if they cant afford it they shouldnt be here .we the working class of great britain say your out of touch with the british people and you certainly aint getting my vote in the election

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
